channel.title: info on RamblingWare
channel.description: Recent content in info on RamblingWare

item.title: Back Online After Migrating DBs
item.description:
Maybe you haven't noticed, but its been a few months since my last blog post. The reason being two fold:
I migrated my blog db from MySQL to Cloudant.The WYSIWYG editor on my dashboard wasn't ready.Now that I've got an alpha 1.

item.title: 2nd Update
item.description: Its been quite a while, since I started my website, and now I'm getting back into things. I've got lots to share, and will be posting more to my other pages. I've added 2 Projects to my Past Projects page. Senior Project and Bookmarks for Bluemix.

item.title: First!
item.description: This post marks when I started building my first blog on Wix, a website-generating factory. Ever since I started my blog on their site, I kept getting a nagging feeling, that I wasn't doing it right... I wasn't programming... I was cheating.
